Game.Name: Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90 (Japan)
Game.plot: Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90 is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by Intec,which was released in Japan in 1990.Cheat: Misc. CodesChoose Pennant Mode and a 130 Days game. Then pick the Taiyo Whales, which is the 6th team from the top. Now, at the score screen where it says "Pennant Race", press the following buttons:Cheat: Misc. CodesAt the "Open Mode", after choosing your Team and the CPU's Team, press Left or Right to change who pitches first.Cheat: Hidden Monsters TeamAt the Pennant or Vs Modes, enter the password screen and input the letter "G" 110 times and for the 10 remaining spaces, enter the very first Japanese character (top-left). Now hit End and you'll be able to play with the Hidden Monsters Team.
Game.Notes: Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90 is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by Intec, which was released in Japan in 1990.
